name: Black to the Future
description: Black to the Future is a city-supported collaborative of 16 community-based organizations. The collaborative works together to provide a comprehensive system of services for black families in San Francisco. YCD is a proud member of Black to the Future and collaborates with fellow CBOs to strengthen social service for black residents spanning family support and advocacy, education, health and wellness, workforce development, and violence prevention.
